entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 10 TO 15 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS AROUND 60

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
